attributes.action: Legislation to protect free speech from cancellation culture
attributes.additional_details: Men and women must have the right to free speech without fear of extremely harmful censure
attributes.background: Stop people’s careers and spontaneity being destroyed by a minority of activists. Everyone is too scared to stand up for women’s rights but these activists are allowed to bully and demean anyone who dares to question that a woman can’t have female genitalia

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Make it illegal to discriminate against someone based on their expressed opinion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604179
